Title: Collateral
Overview: Cab driver Max picks up a man who offers him $600 to drive him around. But the promise of easy money sours when Max realizes his fare is an assassin.
Tagline: It started like any other night.
Keywords: california, taxi, assassin, hostage, taxi driver, fbi, hitman, police, los angeles, murderer, crime, criminal, gun violence
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, DreamWorks SKG, Parkes/MacDonald Productions, Edge City
Cast: Tom Cruise, Jamie Foxx, Jada Pinkett Smith
